sn17.12:1.3: idhaham, bhikkhave, ekaccam puggalam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
sn17.12:1.4: ‘na cayamayasma rupiyapatiyapi suvannacunnaparipuraya hetu sampajanamusa bhaseyya’ti.
sn17.12:1.5: Tamenam passami aparena samayena labhasakkarasilokena abhibhutam pariyadinnacittam sampajanamusa bhasantam.
